description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P2015/1825/S73. The amendment comprises alterations to fourth floor glazing bars on the curtain walling facing Mount Pleasant and introduction of satellite antennas.
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: Condition 2 of planning permission ref: P2015/1825/S73 should read:

CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

AL(0)009 Rev PL, AL(0)010 Rev PL, AL(0)011 Rev PL, AL(0)010 Rev PL, AL(0)012 Rev PL, AL(0)013 Rev PL, AL(0)014 Rev PL, AL(0)015 Rev PL, AL(0)016 Rev PL, AL(0)020 Rev PL, AL(0)020 Rev PL AL(0)021 Rev PL, AL(0)022 Rev PL, AL(0)023 Rev PL, AL(0)030 Rev PL, AL(0)031 Rev PL, AL(0)031 Rev PL, 839_PL_01 Rev P1, 839_PL_02 Rev P2, 839_PL_03 Rev P1, 39_PL_04	Rev P3, 839_PL_05 Rev P2, 839_PL_06 Rev P2, 839_PL_07 Rev P2, 839_PL_08 Rev P2, 839_PL_09 Rev P1, 839_PL_10 Rev P2, 839_PL_11 Rev P1, 839_PL_S1 Rev P1, 839_PL_S2 Rev P1, 839_PL_E1 Rev P6, 839_PL_E2 Rev P3, 839_PL_E3 Rev P7, 839_PL_500 Rev P4, 839_PL_501 Rev P4, 839_PL_502 Rev P4, 839_PL_503 Rev P4, 839_PL_504 Rev P4, 0959 / 440 Rev P1, 0959 / 450 Rev P1, 0959 / 500 Rev P2, 0959 / 510 Rev P2, 0959 / 520 Rev P2, 0959 / 530 Rev P2, 0959 / 540 Rev P2, 0959 / 550 Rev P2, 0959 / 560 Rev P2, 0959 / 570 Rev P2, 839_PL_08-Sat, Planning Statement (June 2014), Planning Statement (May 2015) Design and Access Statement, Revised P46 of Design and Access Statement, Heritage Statement (14/1303), Energy Statement (Rev 4.0 / 01 May 2015), Sustainability Design and Construction Statement (Rev 4.0 / 01 May 2015), Sustainability Officers Feedback  response (G-009[1.1]), Environmental Design Supplementary Planning Document (SPD) 7.0.16 (G-010[1.1]), Daylight and Sunlight Report (7768), Transport Statement (Create Consulting Engineers LTD), Travel Plan (Create Consulting Engineers LTD), Site Waste Management Plan (Create Consulting Engineers LTD), Noise Impact Assessment (13 June 2014) and Construction Management and Logistic Plans (Rev A 16 June 2014). e-mail and attachments of 18th June 2015 from Freya Turtle

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
